pages.text: The $(#490)Imbuing Table$() is the heart of your magical journey. The soulfire burning within provides a limitless supply of magical attunement... $(o)if$() you are willing to offer the necessary ingredients and a piece of your soul.$(br2)Surround your table with bookshelves, stacked up to twice the number as an $(#490)Enchanting Table$(), to boost the magical performance of your table.
